subtitle: Prepare this fish dish an hour before you're ready to cook. Then simply grill for 5 min each side.

method.text: With a sharp knife, make a deep cut down the back of each fish from head to tail. Make a series of diagonal cuts across from this cut to the sides to give the impression of veins of a leaf. Turn the fish over and repeat on the other side.
Place the peppers under the grill, turning as they blacken. Remove the skin and chop the flesh very finely, into 3mm dice.
Mix the peppers with the rest of the marinade ingredients.
Coat both sides of the fish with the marinade and leave in the fridge for 1 hour.
Preheat the grill for 5 min then place the fish under the grill for 5 min on each side.

title: Grilled plaice with garlic, oregano and lemon juice
